h1: How to send us copies of receipts or invoices

ul1.li1: photos or scans of paper receipts or invoices

paragraph2: Your receipts or invoices must show:
paragraph2Tw: Your receipts or invoices must show the:

ul2Ea.li2: the date the equipment was bought
ul2Ea.li3: the full name of the person or company who provided the equipment
ul2Ea.li4: a short description of the equipment

ul2Sw.li1: the amount paid for the support worker
ul2Sw.li3: the dates the support worker provided support
ul2Sw.li4: a short description of the support they provided

ul2Tw.li3: full name of the person or company who provided transport
ul2Tw.li4: address and postcode of both the start and end point of the journey

ul2Ti.li3: full name of the person or company who provided transport
ul2Ti.li4: address and postcode of both the start and end point of the journey

ul2At.li2: the date the work to the vehicle was completed
ul2At.li3: full name of the person or company who completed the work
ul2At.li4: a short description of the adaptation

h2-1: Taking photos or scans of receipts or invoices

ul3.li1: you include the whole receipt or invoice
ul3.li2: the photo or scan is not blurry
ul3.li3: you take photos from above and not at an angle
ul3.li4: you take photos in a well-lit place
